arm_group.description: GnRH long agonist protocol of invitro fertilization
GnRH fixed antagonist protocol of in vitro fertilization

brief_summary.textblock:
This study is intended to evaluate ovarian cells after being submitted do different in vitro
      fertilization protocols. The investigators will analyze hormones secretion and intracellular
      mechanisms of these cells comparing the GnRH agonist protocol and the GnRH antagonist
      protocol.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of  Granulosa Cells Function  After IVF Protocols

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Patient age limit: 39 years

          -  Follicle Stimulating Hormone (FSH) < 10 micrometer (mU) / Liter

          -  Antral follicular count > 12

          -  Regular menses (25 to 35 days)

          -  More than 3 oocytes after ovarian punction

          -  Anti Mullerian between 1 e 3 ng/ml

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients submitted to intracytoplasmatic sperm injection (ICSI)

          -  Ovarian mass or cyst

          -  Clinical / endocrine pathologies

intervention.intervention_name: randomization between the two GnRH analogues (agonist and antagonist)

clinical_study.official_title: In Vitro Evaluation of Luteinized Granulosa Cells After Being Submitted to in Vitro Fertilization Protocols With Gonadotropin-Releasing Hormone (GnRH) Agonist and GnRH Antagonist

oversight_info.authority: Brazil: Associação Fundo de Incentivo à Pesquisa

primary_outcome.description: evaluation of granulosa cells hormone secretion and enzyme expression in media culture 48 hours after ovarian punction
primary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of steroid secretion and enzyme expression in in vitro luteinized granulosa cells

primary_outcome.description: Immediately after the ovarian punction the number of retrieved oocytes will be evaluated

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: the embryologist will verify the number of embryos after 3 to 5 days from the ovarian punction

It will be verified the differences between the two types of gonadotrophins in ovarian stimulation regarding: units of gonadotrophins used, number of retrieved oocytes,number of embryos and embryo score
secondary_outcome.measure: Subgroup analyses comparing FSH versus HMG protocols

clinical_study.source: Hospital de Clinicas de Porto Alegre

lead_sponsor.agency: Hospital de Clinicas de Porto Alegre

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Basic Science
